title: Congress alleges deletion of nine AI videos by BJP governments
description: Congress claims nine of its AI videos were deleted by BJP-led governments, calling it misuse of IT Rules and a suppression of political satire. Social media head Supriya Shrinate said the videos were clearly labeled, highlighted India’s AI issues, and accused PM Modi of prioritizing rhetoric over national interest
